select pp.id, pp.product_sn productSn, pp.brand_id brandId, pp.brand_name brandName, pp.product_category_id productCategoryId, pp.product_category_name productCategoryName, pp.pic pic, pp.name name, pp.sub_title subTitle, pp.price price, pp.sale sale, pp.new_status newStatus, pp.recommand_status recommandStatus, pp.stock stock, pp.promotion_type promotionType, pp.keywords keywords, pp.sort sort, ppav.id attr_id, ppav.value attr_value, ppav.product_attribute_id attr_product_attribute_id, ppa.type attr_type, ppa.name attr_name from pms_product pp left join pms_product_attribute_value ppav on ppav.product_id = pp.id left join pms_product_attribute ppa on ppa.id = ppav.product_attribute_id where pp.delete_status = 0 and pp.publish_status = 1
and pp.id = #{id}
